formulaire.form.download.all.results.lig: The answers to the form will be downloaded in {0} format. The documents filed in the "File deposit"-type questions will not be downloaded as part of this export.
The responses to the form will be downloaded in {0} format.
The documents submitted to “file upload” questions will not be downloaded during this export.
If your form has received over 100 responses, only the graphs for “Multiple Choice” and “Single Response” questions will be downloaded.

formulaire.prop.rgpd.description.intro: Your personal data are collected for: {0}. They will be stored in our files until {1}. At that date, your data will be deleted. In application of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the right to access, correct, erase, and limit the processing of your data. To exercise this right or for any questions regarding the use of your personal data, please contact:
formulaire.prop.rgpd.goal.description:
For example:
- Organizing a field trip with an overnight stay
- Planning parent talks as part of a "Career Day" presentation
formulaire.prop.rgpd.label: Collecting personal data

formulaire.remind.default.body:
Hello,

You have still not answered the following form: {1}

Sincerely.

formulaire.remind.description.multipleFa: The reminder message will be sent to all users who have not yet answered the form.
formulaire.remind.description.multipleTr: The reminder message will be sent to all users to whom the form was sent.
formulaire.remind.link: As a reminder, the link to the form is:
formulaire.remind.link.label: Form link:

formulaire.responses.empty.notif: You will receive a notification as soon as a form is submitted.
formulaire.responses.send.text: Once your form has sent, you can no longer edit your responses.
Once you’ve received confirmation that your form has been sent, your responses can be viewed by the form’s owner and admins. You can always edit your responses at a later date.
Would you like to confirm and send your edited reponses?
